body:
Poor chubby chick (Cant remember her name for fuck, "Ryouko" or sth?). Yeah the "Class Rep" Arc still fucked with me head, its has the same atmosphere as those of "great tragedy" like those of "key"'s Stories but not the extend of the characters in said Story on the receiving end, but us, the player/watcher.
Nice last page, told you that this Author have a sense of humour if it was them themself done that.
